description.value: Your patron aeon has allowed you to call upon their gifts to serve their ends. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Augury] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Calm Emotions] each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
